definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Signals in the spectrum can penetrate walls, making it ideal for wireless broadband.
sentences.chinese: 该频段的信号可以穿透墙壁，从而非常适合无线宽带。

sentences.english: This paper proposes an optimization design method for multi-channel broadband phase shifter with constant difference step.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种多通道宽带等差步进移相器的优化设计方法。

sentences.english: Because people have lives. And now, people with lives also have broadband.
sentences.chinese: 因为人们需要活力，而且现在人们的生活离不开宽带。

sentences.english: Mao Shouliang quietly sneaked into the brothel, he saw Mr Broadband man at the door.
sentences.chinese: 毛寿良悄悄溜入青楼，他看到冯正宽带人在门口。

sentences.english: At the same time, it utilizes the existing broadband resources.
sentences.chinese: 同时，盘活了已有的宽带资源。

sentences.english: All I need is a broadband connection.
sentences.chinese: 我只要一个宽带接入就行了。

sentences.english: The company spend billions on souped-up broadband services.
sentences.chinese: 公司投资数十亿用来提高宽带网的服务质量。

sentences.english: Introduced the designs and implementation plans of Maanshan CATV broadband data network.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了马鞍山有线宽带数据网的设计与组网方案。

sentences.english: The sealed enclosure and the wide-bandwidth single-reflex bandpass are the least efficient designs.
sentences.chinese: 密闭箱和宽带单反射带通是效率最差的设计。

sentences.english: Virgin Media has started trials to deliver fibre-optic high-speed broadband over telegraph poles.
sentences.chinese: 维珍传媒已开始试验使用电线杆架设高速光纤宽带。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a remote meter -reading system based on CATV broad band network.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种基于有线电视宽带网的远方抄表系统。

sentences.english: Design of broadband piezoelectric ceramic receiver.
sentences.chinese: 宽带化压电陶瓷受话器的设计。

sentences.english: Aim To improve the performance of layered space-time coding (LSTC) for wideband downlink transmission.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高无线宽带下行传输中分层空时编码的性能。

sentences.english: The center-fed cage antenna is optimized and designed.
sentences.chinese: 优化设计了一种性能良好的笼形中馈宽带天线。

sentences.english: The competition structure of the broad-band service market in Shanghai has been formed.
sentences.chinese: 上海宽带业务运营市场的竞争格局已经形成。

sentences.english: Dual, Wideband, High Output Current, Operational Amplifier with Current Limit.
sentences.chinese: 双路，宽带，高输出电流运算放大器的电流限制。

definition: China Mobile Tietong, state-owned telecommunications operator (abbr. for 中移鐵通|中移铁通[Zhong1 yi2 Tie3 tong1])
China Telecom (Chinese company providing mobile phone service)
China United Telecommunications Corporation/aka China Unicom or Unicom/abbr. for 中國聯通|中国联通
China Netcom (CNC), former telecommunication service provider in PRC
set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc
